text: Isabella, Princess of Asturias (2 October 1470 â€“ 23 August 1498) was the eldest daughter and heiress presumptive of King Ferdinand II of Aragon and Queen Isabella I of Castile. She was Queen of Portugal as the wife of King Manuel I from 30 September 1497 until her death in 1498. title: Isabella of Asturias
